question: Nowadays people make new friends through social networks and internet chat groups. Some people think this is good. Others thinks face to face interaction is essential. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
text: Social networking applications have brought a revolution in the web world as a result more and more people getting to know each other. A few people believe that this is a good trend whereas another group of society opines physical presence is necessary. I shall discuss both thoughts in the upcoming paragraphs with my opinion.

To begin with, online chatting is the only source of interaction in this fast-paced life. Socializing is very difficult for People such as foreign workers and students who study in boarding schools hence the internet provides an accessible platform for communication. I would like to mention the COVID 19 pandemic time when physical contact was prohibited to control the disease then online applications eg. Facebook, Snapchat,and Instagram have been the real support for everyone to communicate with friends and family.

Going with the other group, Face-to-face talk is very important. Talking to someone is more satisfactory when we are able to look into the eye and see their facial expressions. Psychology has a specific section that discusses  human personality with face gestures which is used by most of the interviewers to examine the interview. Being physically available to someone provides warmth and a sense of security.
I believe, Both opinions has their own value. Where internet pro

The verb has does not seem to agree with the subject. Consider changing the verb form.
